titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to permit appellants to appear in disability compensation cases before the Board of Veterans' Appeals by picture and voice transmission from locations other than facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
VA Tele-Hearing Modernization Act
VA Tele-Hearing Modernization Act
VA Tele-Hearing Modernization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
